```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, include = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# read in lobster data

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(tidyr)

lobster_ab <- read_csv("lobster_abundance_sbc_lter.csv", na = "-99999") %>% 
  clean_names()

lobster_tidy <- lobster_ab %>% 
  uncount(count)
```

```{r}
annual_ab_site <- lobster_tidy %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  count(site)
```

```{r}
ggplot()
```
